summary: 该文档主要介绍了巨量千川平台的数据类型，包括服务数据、订单数据、账户认证数据、协议信息、客户数据推广内容数据、活动数据和其他客户使用数据等。这些数据用于统计、分析和聚合形成衍生数据，用于平台运营和决策。运营策略或平台规则体现在对数据的收集、分析和应用上，以提供更好的服务和优化用户体验。
text: “服务数据”指（1）账号/账户服务相关数据，包括账号/账户信息，账号/账户授予或取得的权限，账户登录、管理、授权、绑定、协作和其他操作相关数据等；（2）数据推广计划/订单相关数据，包括推广服务费结算数据、互动数据、成交数据、投入回报率、转化率等；（3）账户认证和经营资质相关信息、记录与文件；（4）协议相关信息，包括协议文本、签约主体名称、签署情况、有效期等；（5）客户方数据推广内容相关数据（包括观看量、点赞量、评论量、分享量、加入粉丝团数量等数据），推广关联抖音号主页信息（包括关注量、访问量、主页橱窗访问量等）和商业性使用相关数据（包括商品点击量、商品下单量、商品订单量、商品订单金额等）；（6）客户参加巨量千川平台及其关联平台举办的调研、营销、测试等活动而产生的数据；（7）其他客户使用本服务和使用本服务过程中产生的数据；和（8）巨量千川平台及关联平台对上述数据进行统计、分析和聚合而形成的衍生数据。

page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/巨量千川规则中心/法律法规及平台规则/其他规则/_历史版本_巨量千川数据推广服务协议-24.2.26.html
summary: 这段内容主要介绍了服务数据的概念及其包含的内容，包括用户服务相关信息、数据推广计划/订单数据、账户 authentication 和业务资格信息、合同信息、客户营销材料数据、参与 OESA 平台和关联平台活动产生的数据、以及通过服务生成的数据等。服务数据是平台进行统计、分析和聚合的重要依据，对于运营策略和平台规则的制定和执行具有重要意义。
text: "Service Data" refers to (1) account service-related data, including account information, account permissions granted or acquired, the management, authorization, binding, collaboration and operation-related data, etc.; (2) data related to data promotion plans/orders, including Promotion Service Fee settlement data, interaction data, transaction data, return on investment, conversion rate, etc.; (3) the information, records and documents related to account authentication and business qualification; (4) contract information, indluding the text of the agreement, the name of the contracting party, signing status and validity period, etc.); (5) data related to the Customer's Marketing Materials, including the views, likes, comments, shares, number of members joining the fan group, etc., and the homepage information (including the number of followers, visits, visits to the home page window, etc.) and data related to commercial use (including clicks on products, the number of product orders, the number of product orders, the amount of product orders, etc.) of the promotion-related Douyin account; (6) data generated by customers participating in research, marketing, and testing activities held by the OESA Platform and Affiliating Platforms; (7) other data generated by customers using the service and in the process of using the service; and (8) derivative data formed by the OESA Platform and Affiliating Platforms through statistics, analysis, and aggregation of the above data.

text: “Unreasonable Benefits” refers to that the benefits obtained by the Customer from the Company a customer obtains from the platform (calculated based on the face value of the rebate, grants, red envelopes, coupons and other OESA beneficial rights, or the corresponding traffic resources) exceed 30% of the actual Promotion Service Fee paid by the Customer, or a significant deviation between a single Customer's data and total Customers' data exists.

summary: Doudian Platform allows customers who register a store to authorize OESA to access their store's authentication, qualification and bank account verification information to register an OESA account. This OESA account establishes a relationship with the Doudian store and the Douyin account, allowing access to the OESA account and relevant data through the Douyin store and Douyin account integration process. The authorization and binding relationship between the Douyin store and OESA account terminates when the Douyin store and Douyin account integration process is terminated, but data obtained and promotion orders before termination are not affected.
text: （2）In the event that the Customer has registered a store on Doudian Platform ("Doudian Store"), the Customer, deemed as in the role of a "Merchant", shall authorize OESA to obtain and review the authentication entity information, qualification information and bank account verification information of the Doudian Store, which will be submitted to register an OESA Account in the role of a "Merchant". The OESA Account shall establish an authorization and binding relationship with the Doudian Store, and the Douyin account that has been or will be bound with the Doudian Store through the Doudian Store & Douyin Account Integration Process (such account, the "Official Douyin Account of the Store"), based on which, the Customer or any authorized third parties may access and operate the OESA Account via the Official Douyin Account of the Store and the Douyin Account of the Store, as well as access relevant data of the Official Douyin Account of the Store and the Douyin Account of the Store via the OESA Account, or access relevant data of the OESA Account via the Official Douyin Account of the Store and the Douyin Account. Once the authorization and binding relationship between the Official Douyin Account of the Store and the Douyin Account of the Store is terminated, the authorization and binding relationship between the Douyin Account of the Store and the OESA Account will be terminated accordingly; however, any and all relevant data obtained and promotion orders submitted before the termination shall not be affected.

summary:
【核心要点】
该文档规定，除非书面另有约定，客户需承认大东店/购买账户的认证信息需与OESA账户保持一致，这是有效注册OESA账户的前提。如果OESA发现认证信息有不一致的地方，有权采取管理措施，如限制OESA账户，修复 entity 信息异常，或要求客户重新上传相关资质。

【运营策略或平台规则】
该文档规定了客户在注册OESA账户时，需将大东店/购买账户的认证信息与OESA账户保持一致，以确保账户的有效性。客户需遵守这一规则，否则OESA有权采取相应措施。这一规定体现了平台对账户安全的管理策略和规则。
text: （5）Unless otherwise agreed in writing, the Customer shall acknowledge that the authentication information of the Doudian Store/Buyin Account shall be consistent with the OESA Account, which constitutes one of the premises of a validly registered OESA Account. In the event that OESA identifies any inconsistency of the authentication information, OESA shall be entitled to take management measures, including but not limited to imposing Restrictive Measures on the OESA Account, fixing the abnormal display of entity information and requiring the Customer to re-upload relevant qualifications.

title: (1) With the role of a "Merchant", the Customer'

summary: 该文档解释了当用户担任“商家”角色时，其现有的或未来的抖音商店官方账号将默认为客户首次注册的“官方抖音账号”。在其他情况下，客户或经客户授权的营销服务提供商在注册OESA账号时所使用的抖音账号将作为OESA账号的“官方抖音账号”。客户可在服务相关协议和规则的范围内，操作符合条件的抖音账号与OESA账号建立“官方授权”关系，成为OESA账号的“官方抖音账号”。基于官方授权，官方抖音账号可以登录、访问和操作OESA账号，OESA账号获得以下授权。
text: (1) With the role of a "Merchant", the Customer's existing or future Official Douyin Account of the Store will by default become the "Official Douyin Account" of the first OESA Account registered by the Customer. In other scenarios, the Douyin account used by the Customer or the Marketing Service Provider authorized by the Customer when registering the OESA Account shall be the "Official Douyin Account" of the OESA Account. The Customer may, within the scope permitted by the Service-related Agreements and Rules, operate a qualified Douyin Account to establish an "Official Authorization" relationship with an OESA Account, and become the "Official Douyin account" of the OESA Account. Based on the Official Authorization, the Official Douyin Account can log in, access and operate the OESA Account, and the OESA Account obtains the following authorizations.

text: （2）操作与协议签署权限。基于官方授权，巨量千川账户有权在巨量千川平台代表官方抖音号进行各项操作（包括但不限于使用或授权第三方使用排他性投放产品或服务对官方抖音号进行投放）和同意数据推广相关的协议、规范和规则等。

summary: 该文档主要规定了OESA账户在数据推广方面的权限和执行操作。根据官方授权，OESA账户可以进行各种操作，如使用或授权第三方使用独家推广服务或产品，以推广官方抖音账号。同时，OESA账户需要遵守与数据推广相关的所有协议、指南和规则等。
text: (2) Permissions of Operation and Execution of Agreements. Based on the Official Authorization, the OESA Account shall be entitled to perform various operations（including but not limited to using or authorizing a third-party to use exclusive promotion services or products for promoting the Official Douyin Account） and agree to any and all data-promotion-related agreements, guidelines and rules, etc. in relation to data promotion.

text: （3）推广素材授权。基于官方授权，客户在使用本服务时，有权使用官方抖音号在“抖音”软件及相关服务上传、发布或传输的内容（包括但不限文字，图片，视频，音频、直播等各种形式的内容及其中包括的音乐、声音、台词、视觉设计、对话等所有组成部分）进行信息网络传播，用于包括但不限于品牌、产品、活动的营销、宣传、推广等商业用途。为避免疑义，客户理解并同意，上述授予的权利包括使用、复制和展示该抖音号拥有或被许可使用并植入内容中的个人形象、肖像、姓名、商标、服务标志、品牌、名称、标识和公司标记（如有）以及任何其他品牌、营销或推广资产、物料、素材等的权利和许可。

page_url: 总知识库_cleaned/巨量千川规则中心/法律法规及平台规则/其他规则/_历史版本_巨量千川数据推广服务协议-24.2.26.html
summary: 该文档主要规定了用户在使用抖音平台上的内容发布和传输时，授权使用平台内的各种资源，包括但不限于文字、图片、视频、音频、直播、音乐、声音、线条、视觉设计、对话等，用于进行商业目的的营销、宣传和推广活动。用户也需要理解并同意，所授权的权利包括使用、复制和展示个人形象、肖像、姓名、商标、服务标志、品牌、名称、标志等，以及平台拥有的或获得授权使用的任何品牌、营销或促销资产、材料等。
text: （3）Authorization of Marketing Materials. Based on the Official Authorization, during the process of receiving the Services, the Customer is entitled to use the contents uploaded, released or transmitted through the Douyin Account on Douyin and related services (including but not limited to texts, pictures, videos, audios, live broadcasts and other forms of contents as well as all their components including music, sound, lines, visual design, dialogue, etc.) to transmit information on the Internet for commercial purposes including but not limited to marketing, publicity and promotion of brands, products and events, as well as use the authorized content to promote the live room. For the avoidance of doubt, the Customer understands and agrees that, the rights granted above include the rights and licenses to use, reproduce and display personal images, portraits, names, trademarks, service marks, brands, names, logos and company logos (if any), any other branding, marketing or promotional assets, supplies, materials, etc. that the Douyin Account owns or is licensed to use and embed in the contents.

text: （4）数据授权。基于官方授权，客户有权通过巨量千川账户查看官方抖音号在商业性活动中产生的数据,包括短视频/直播的相关数据（包括但不限于观看量、加入粉丝团人数、评论量、分享量等相关聚合维度数据），以及抖音号主页的相关数据（包括但不限于主页内关注数、访问量、主页橱窗访问量），短视频/直播内容如涉及客户的商品的相关数据（包括商品点击量、商品下单量、商品订单量、商品订单金额等数据）以及基于前述数据进行分析的相关转化率等衍生数据。客户知悉并同意，官方授权终止后，本条所述授权内容已被巨量千川用户查看、使用或保存的部分，将继续保留在巨量千川账户内，不必执行任何过滤、屏蔽或删除操作。

title: (4) Authorization of Data. Based on the Official

summary: 该文档主要说明用户在商业活动中，基于官方授权，可以访问官方抖音账号生成的相关数据，包括短视频/直播数据、主页数据、商品相关数据等，以及基于这些数据的衍生数据。官方授权终止后，已查看、使用或保存的用户内容可在OESA平台账户中保留，不会被隐藏、删除或删除。运营策略是提供丰富的数据资源，并通过授权管理确保用户合法访问和使用。
text: (4) Authorization of Data. Based on the Official Authorization, the Customer is entitled to access relevant data generated by the Official Douyin Account during commercial activities, including relevant data of short videos/live broadcasts (including but not limited to the number of views, the number of people who join the fan club, the number of comments, the number of reposts and other relevant aggregated data), relevant data of the home page of the Douyin Account (including but not limited to the number of followers of the home page, the number of visits, and the number of visits to the home page window), relevant data of short video/live broadcast contents concerning the commodities of the Customer (including the number of clicks, the number of order placing, the number of orders and the order amount, etc.) and derivative data such as conversion rate that are analyzed based on the above data. After the Official Authorization is terminated, the authorized contents already viewed, used or saved by the Customer can be kept in the OESA Platform Account without being hided, removed or deleted.

summary: 该文档说明， influencer 和 merchant 需要在 OESA 平台登录，并同意平台共享其 Douyin 账户信息以进行验证。为优化服务，平台会检查账户是否已与 Doudian 平台 store 绑定，以及完成 Premium Affiliate 平台身份信息的认证。若未注册 OESA 平台，将获取账户信息并生成在线指南。
text: (2) If you are an influencer or a merchant, when you log in the Ocean Engine Buyin Platform with a Douyin Account and click the OESA Platform login portal provided by the Ocean Engine Buyin Platform to apply for registering an OESA Platform Account, use various services of the OESA Platform and view relevant data on advertisement placement, you understand and agree that your above operation indicates that you agree to authorize Ocean Engine Buyin Platform to share your Douyin Account information for logging in Ocean Engine Buyin Platform with OESA Platform, so that the OESA Platform can verify your identity. You understand and agree that, in order to verify your identity, confirm whether you meet the conditions for registering an account, and optimize the services provided to you based on your situation, the OESA Platform will also check with the Doudian Platform whether the Douyin Account you designated has been bound to a Doudian Platform store account in normal operating status, and/or check with the Premium Affiliate Platform whether you have completed the authentication of the identity information of the Premium Affiliate Platform-related account. If it is found after verification that your Douyin Account has not been registered with the OESA Platform, you authorize the platform to obtain your Douyin Account information and generate online instructions in subsequent pages. You shall complete the application for registering an OESA Platform Account according to the instructions.

summary: 该文档说明，当用户申请开通巨量千川账户时，需使用巨量千川平台的指定抖音号申请，并授权平台共享用户巨量百应账户信息和指定抖音号信息以便核验身份。如经核验符合条件，平台将获取用户相关信息并生成操作提示，用户需按提示完成开通操作。核心要点是巨量千川平台将共享用户信息以核验身份，并获取用户授权以开通巨量千川账户。
text: （3）当您为机构时，如您点击巨量百应平台提供的巨量千川平台登录入口，以申请开通巨量千川账户，使用巨量千川平台的各项服务和查看广告投放相关数据，并根据后续页面提示使用符合巨量千川平台约定条件的抖音号（“指定抖音号”）申请以百应机构账户的认证主体名义开通巨量千川账户，您理解并同意，您的上述的操作表明您同意授权巨量百应平台将您的巨量百应账户信息和指定抖音号信息共享至巨量千川平台，以便巨量千川平台核验您的身份。您理解并同意，为核验您的身份，确认您是否符合账号开通条件，以及根据您的情况优化为您提供的服务，巨量千川平台还将向抖店平台核实您的巨量百应账户的认证主体是否已绑定正常经营的店铺账号，和/或您的指定抖音号是否已绑定正常经营的店铺账号，和/或向精选联盟平台核实您的指定抖音号是否完成精选联盟平台相关账户的身份信息认证。如经核验后发现您的指定抖音号符合开通巨量千川账户的条件，您授权巨量千川平台获取您的巨量百应账户信息和指定抖音号信息（包括但不限于头像、昵称信息）并生成后续页面操作提示，您应根据提示完成申请开通巨量千川账户操作。

summary: 这段内容主要是关于申请注册 OESA 平台账户的操作指南。首先，需要使用 OESA 平台提供的登录入口进行注册，并使用 Douyin 账户遵守平台的约定。在注册过程中，OESA 平台会与其合作方进行身份验证，并会查看广告投放等相关数据。如果经过验证，平台将获取用户的 Ocean Engine Buyin 账户信息和 Designated Douyin 账户信息，以便提供更加个性化的服务。用户需要按照后续页面的指示完成注册操作。
text: (3) If you are an institution, when you click the OESA Platform login portal provided by the Ocean Engine Buyin Platform to apply for registering an OESA Platform Account, use various services of the OESA Platform and view relevant data on advertisement placement and use the Douyin Account in compliance with the agreed terms of the OESA Platform (the “Designated Douyin Account”) to apply for registering an OESA Platform Account in the name of the certified subject of the Buyin institution account according to the instructions on subsequent pages, you understand and agree that your above operation indicates that you agree to authorize the Ocean Engine Buyin Platform to share your Ocean Engine Buyin Account information and the Designated Douyin Account information with OESA Platform so that the OESA Platform can verify your identity. You understand and agree that, in order to verify your identity, confirm whether you meet the conditions for registering an account, and optimize the services provided to you based on your situation, the OESA Platform will also check with the Doudian Platform whether the authenticated entity of your Ocean Engine Buyin Account has been bound to a Doudian Platform store account in normal operating status, and/or whether Designated Douyin Account has been bound to the account of the store in normal operation, and/or verify with the Premium Affiliate Platform whether you have completed the authentication of the identity information of the Premium Affiliate Platform-related account. If it is found after verification that your designated Douyin Account meets the conditions for registering an OESA Platform Account, you authorize the OESA Platform to obtain your Ocean Engine Buyin Account information and your Designated Douyin Account information (including but not limited to profile and nickname information) and generate online instructions in subsequent pages. You shall complete the application for registering an OESA Platform Account according to the instructions.

summary: 该文档介绍了Quick Access功能，当客户通过OESA平台提供的链接访问其他业务平台时，系统会识别出Ocean Engine Business Account，该账户与客户所登录的OESA平台账户相关联，以及与Ocean Engine Business Account关联的其他业务平台账户。这样，客户可以实现自动登录。这是为了优化访问和登录体验。
text: （2）Quick Access. summary: 该文档解释了在客户编辑或暂停促销计划的情况下，需要一定时间才能将促销服务费用生成的数据恢复。因此，系统可能会在操作成功执行之前处理客户设置的促销计划并收取促销服务费用，然后在OESA平台上扣除余额，这可能会在OESA平台的数据仪表板上延迟显示。主要信息是，如果客户编辑或暂停促销计划，系统会继续处理，并在操作成功执行后收取费用。核心要点是系统会处理客户设置的促销计划，并在操作成功执行前收取费用。
text: （3）In the event that the Customer edits or suspends the promotion plan, a certain period of time shall be taken for the data generated by the Promotion Service Fee before the operation to return. Therefore, the system may still process the promotion plan set by the Customer and charge the Promotion Service Fee before the operation instruction is successfully executed and deduct the balance in the OESA Account, which may be displayed on the data dashboard of the OESA Platform after a delay.

summary:
文档提到，系统各模块感知并执行客户操作指令需要一定时间，平台会努力缩短时间差。但受现有技术和条件限制，时间差仍存在。客户不应利用此时间差获得不合理利益。

text: （4）It may take a certain amount of time for the Customer's operation instructions to be sensed and successfully executed by each module of the system. The platform will make commercially reasonable efforts to shorten the time difference, but it is still limited by the current situation that the existing technology and conditions can achieve. Customers should not take advantage of such time differences to gain any Unreasonable Benefits.

text: (2) The intellectual property rights of the Customer's Marketing Materials to the Company shall be owned by the Customer. The Company and its affiliates shall have the right to modify, reproduce, adapt, translate, compile the corresponding contents or produce derivative products. The Company shall use the Customer's Marketing Materials for the purposes agreed upon by both parties, and shall not abuse or infringe upon the legitimate interests of the Customer, or depreciate the image of the Customer.

summary:

text: （2）The scope of examination and verification by the Company shall be limited to the formality examination and verification on the legality of the Customer's Marketing Materials. If the Customer's Marketing Materials contain links, the Company shall only examine and verify whether the link can be successfully displayed and opened on mobile phones, computers and other terminal devices, and the Company shall not be responsible for examining and verifying the content directed to by the link.

text: The examination and verification of the Company does not mean that the Company is responsible for the authenticity and legality of the Customer's Marketing Materials .The Customer shall take full responsibility for any disputes, claims and disagreements arising from the Customer's Marketing Materials, the transaction, performance, after-sale services and other post-data-promotion activities related to the products or services sold or promoted by the Customer, and shall compensate the Company for any loss caused to the company and/or its affiliates (including but not limited to any third-party claims, compensation paid in advance, or punishment by state agencies, etc.). At that time, the customer shall not refuse to assume the liability for compensation in accordance with this agreement because the Customer's Marketing Materials and relevant qualifications have been reviewed by the Company or provided by other third parties.

summary:
公司有权根据相关法律法规、公司业务策略和市场环境的变化，随时调整广告审查规则、行业准入标准、数据推广规则和特定行业安全存款要求。公司将通过公告、电子邮件等合理方式通知客户。如果客户的用法不符合公司的调整后规则和要求，客户需立即修改数据推广服务或补充相关文件，以符合调整后的标准，并提交给公司审查，或立即停止数据推广服务并书面通知公司终止协议。如果客户未立即停止使用服务或修改或补充的文档仍无法满足调整后的规则，公司有权拒绝或暂停发布无法满足调整后规则的客户营销材料，无需承担任何责任。

text: The Company has the right to, in accordance with changes in relevant laws and regulations, the adjustment of national policies and market environment as well as the needs of the Company’s business strategy, adjust advertisement review rules, industry access standards, data promotion rules and specific industry security deposit requirements from time to time. The Company will notify the Customer of the above adjusted rules and requirements in the form of announcement, e-mail or other reasonable way specified on OESA Platform.If the Customer's usage of the Services no longer meets the adjusted rules and requirements of the Company, the Customer shall immediately modify the Data Promotion Services or supplement relevant documents in accordance with the adjusted standards and submit them to the Company for review, or immediately stop the Data Promotion Services and notify the Company in writing to terminate the Agreement. If the Customer does not immediately stop using the services or the modified or supplemented documents still cannot meet the requirements of the adjusted rules, the Company shall have the right to refuse or suspend the release of the Customer's Marketing Materials that cannot meet the requirements of the adjusted rules without any liability.

text: （2）The statistics generated by the Company shall serve as the basis for settlement by both parties. Under the premise that the Customer complies with the Service-related Agreements and Rules, and the rules for monitoring and collecting statistics announced or otherwise notified by the Company, within the available scope of the types of the Services and the RITs agreed by the Company, the Customer may entrust a third party to monitor and collect statistics; provided that the statistics generated by third-party agencies shall not serve as the basis for settlement. With respect to the information obtained during the process of statistics monitoring and collecting, the Customer and third-party statistical agencies shall keep strictly confidential, and shall not use the information for purposes other than the Services. Customers shall implement by themselves or ensure that third-party agencies implement necessary measures and technical means that are not lower than the industry level to ensure data security.

text: （3）The Customer acknowledges and agrees that all rights (including copyright, trademark right, patent right, trade secret and other relevant rights) of data and other information (including words, pictures, audios, videos, diagrams, color palettes and layout designs) formed through analysis, integration and data collection shall belong to the Company. text: The Customer understands and agrees, one of the purposes of the Services is to provide the Customer with a channel to promote relevant products and services, and to provide the audience with an appropriate display of relevant products and services. The Company does not support any improper mining of the specific real identities of the audience or intrusive behavior towards the audience.The Customer promises not to use personal information or label categories that reflect the real identity of the audience, relates to the personal plight of the data subject or are biased and discriminatory in order to infringe on individual rights or impose unreasonable differential treatment on counterparties of a transaction. If the Customer violates the provisions of this article, it shall be responsible for compensating for the damage caused to the Company, the Company's affiliated companies and data subjects, and assume full responsibility.

summary: 该文档规定，若客户因运营需求或与服务有关的争议而申请查询数据，需按照OESA平台的要求提交书面数据查询申请。超过存储期限的查询可能无法支持，或产生不合理的商业成本。若未能按时提交数据查询申请，客户将被视为放弃数据查询权。
text: （2）In the event that the Customer applies to query data due to operational needs or disputes related to the Services, the Customer should submit a written document for the data query application in accordance with the requirements of the OESA Platform. Limited by the data storage peirod, overdue inquiry may not be supported, or will incur unreasonable commercial costs. In case of failing to submit a data inquiry application to the platform in time, the customer shall be deemed as waiving data query rights.

text: The Company shall be entitled to preserve the Service Data on the servers of the Company and/or its affiliated companies within the scope permitted by laws and regulations.
